mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MyHabit (user_id, habit_id, state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{habitId}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT h.habit_title FROM MyHabit mh JOIN HABIT h ON mh.habit_id = h.habit_id WHERE mh.user_id = #{userId} AND mh.state = '진행';
SELECT h.habit_title, h.category_title FROM MyHabit mh JOIN Habit h ON mh.habit_id = h.habit_id WHERE mh.state = 'OFF';
SELECT h.habit_title, h.category_title FROM MyHabit mh JOIN Habit h ON mh.habit_id = h.habit_id WHERE mh.state = 'ON';
